note: Community member, settler, parent, maker. BA, BFA, NCT. Screaming “Viruses are not our friends!” into the void. (she/her). @amandalhu on Twitter.
Eye Surgeon. BSc (Med) Hons I MBBS MSc (Research) FRANZCO GAICD. Exec MBA Candidate. Clinical interests: Cataract, Refractive Surgery, Keratoconus, Cornea.
Distinguished Professor in Atmospheric Chemistry, UC San Diego. Director of NSF CAICE (http://caice.ucsd.edu)
Geriatrician. FRACP. Jokes and historical pearls on tap. Health UX. HAES. Shameless Trekkie. Also @DrKate_Miller

Lawyer, litigator, patent/TM agent. Biochem. ♿ rights.

Viruses float like smoke. Wear N95. #COVIDisAirborne🌬️🔅
